ComicInfo.Summary:
A Witch Shall Be Born [Chapter I]: Taramis learns that her twin sister is alive and has managed to take her place on the throne of Khauran.
[A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter II: A People Betrayed: Salome, posing as Taramis, orders the Khauran army to disband and turn control of the city over to Constantius and his men, but Conan refuses her order. The army is slain, and Conan is taken prisoner.
[A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter III: The Tree of Death: Constantius has Conan nailed to a cross in the desert. Conan is later rescued by Olgerd, leader of a band of outlaws.
[A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter IV: A Letter to Nemedia: Seven months later, with Salome's impersonation of Taramis complete, she and Constantius have been ravaging the city of Khauran.
[A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter V: ...and Dwell in Darkness: Marcois learns that Taramis is still alive and being held in the dungeon by Salome.
[A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter VI: Wolves of the Desert: Conan takes control of the army that Olgerd had gathered and prepares to attack Khauran.
[A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter VII: The Voice in the Crystal: Constantius and his army meet Conan and his army in the desert outside Khauran.
[A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter VIII: The Shadow from the Temple: Conan and Marcois rescue Taramis from Salome's dungeon.
[A Witch Shall Be Born] Epilogue: Conan gets his revenge on Constantius.
ComicInfo.Title: A Witch Shall Be Born [Chapter I]; [A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter II: A People Betrayed; [A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter III: The Tree of Death; [A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter IV: A Letter to Nemedia; [A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter V: ...and Dwell in Darkness; [A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter VI: Wolves of the Desert; [A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter VII: The Voice in the Crystal; [A Witch Shall Be Born] Chapter VIII: The Shadow from the Temple; [A Witch Shall Be Born] Epilogue
